subject: Re: Searching for a mail client
body:
jiri s. wrote:
> What about mutt or pine / alpine

The problem with pine is that the license is not DFSG-free and
therefore cannot be included in Debian.  There are helper installers
available for it that grab the source and compile it though.

Mutt is of course highly recommended.

Bob
